revised_title: Further Observations on the Icy Mountain, or Gletscher, in Canton of Berne, Switzerland
tldr: The author provides a detailed description and representation of the Gletscher, an icy mountain in the Canton of Berne, Switzerland. The account discusses the mountain's growth, the noise it makes, the cracks and caverns formed by ice bursting, and the variety of colors visible when the sun shines on it. The text also mentions nearby huts and a similar mountain near Geneva.
